name: RTK13WPK - Watercolor Painting Style Officer CG Set Shu 水彩画風武将CG 蜀セット
detailed_description:
Officer graphics for five officers of Shu done in Watercolor painting style will be added.

▼Added Officers Graphics
Liu Bei/Guan Yu/Zhang Fei/Zhao Yun/Zhuge Liang

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the applicable officers listed above. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

※Valid only for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack."

Minimum:

  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
